mapper.select: SELECT goods_name goodsName, bookId isbn, introduction goodsDescribe, price goodsPrice, picture goodsImagePath, star_level goodsEvaluateScore, author goodsAuthor, publisher goodsPress FROM t_goods_table WHERE good_id = #{goodsId} AND is_delete =0

SELECT b.user_acct userAcct, a.appraise_txt evaluateContent, a.star_level evaluateScore, a.create_time createTime FROM t_appraise_table a, t_sys_user b, t_goods_table c WHERE a.user_id = b.user_code AND c.good_id = a.goods_id AND a.goods_id = #{goodsId}
and a.star_level = #{evaluateScore}
SELECT cate_id classifyId, cate_name classifyName FROM t_cate_table WHERE cate_id_parent =0
select cate_id , cate_name from t_cate_table where is_delete =0 and cate_id_parent = #{cateId}
select good_id goodsId, picture goodsImagePath, goods_name goodsName, price goodsPrice from t_goods_table where is_delete =0 and category = #{cate_id} order by category asc
